body.p: Prior to installation, ensure that the latest stable Eclipse version (available at the release date of ) is installed on your computer. The current Eclipse version number is .

supports only official and stable Java virtual machine versions and later from Sun/Oracle (available at http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html) and from Apple Computer. The Java Virtual Machine from Apple is pre-installed on Mac OS X computers. For Mac OS X, Java Virtual Machine updates are available at the Apple website. may work very well with JVM implementations from other vendors but the eventual incompatibilities will not be solved in further releases. does not work with the GNU libgcj Java virtual machine.
